events.title: Registration
events.description: Register to the hackathon and get your swag! Make sure to have your ID ready

events.title: Baggage check-in
events.description: Bring your baggage and we will store it for you

events.title: Opening Talk
events.description: Introductory talk. Meet our sponsors and discover the prizes

events.title: Hacking Starts
events.description: Ready. Set. GO!

events.title: Dinner
events.description: Enjoy our first meal

events.title: Team Building
events.description: Looking for a team or new teammates?

events.title: [Talk] Between: Challenge
events.description: Come check Between's challenge introductory talk

events.title: [Talk] Why you should hack in Go
events.description: Discover Go language with former HackUPC organizer Daniel Martí

events.title: [Talk] Intro to Android
events.description: Join Rashiq for an awesome introduction to Android development

events.title: [Talk] Intro to WebDev with Flask
events.description: Get started in the web development world using Flask and Python with Rashiq

events.title: Midnight Snack
events.description: Feeling hungry? Come get some sweet waffles

events.title: The Game starts
events.description: You lost

events.title: Breakfast
events.description: Come get some energizing breakfast

events.title: Showers
events.description: Don't forget to bring your towel

events.title: [Talk] Everis: Artificial Intelligence as a Service
events.description: Come learn AI with an awesome group of Everis engineers

events.title: [Talk] Between: Intro to functional programming
events.description: Enter the functional programming world with Between

events.title: [Talk] Intro to Big Data
events.description: Come listen to Ricardo Baeza in a talk about Big Data and Data Science

events.title: [Talk] Blockchain
events.description: Join Dario (CTO at VERSE) in a 30 minutes introduction of the Blockchain technology

events.title: Lunch
events.description: Come enjoy an awesome typical Spanish paella

events.title: [Talk] Organize your hackathon
events.description: Would you like to organize a hackathon? Come listen some of our experiences and tips. Don't be shy! We are here to help you!

events.title: Dinner
events.description: PIZZA TIME

events.title: Slideshow Karaoke
events.description: A hackers favourite game. Are you ready to improvise?

events.title: Midnight Snack
events.description: It's been more than 24 hours. Get some sweet snacks to keep yourself motivated

events.title: EPIC NERF GUNS BATTLE
events.description: Come and play a HackUPC classic. Nerf guns, 2 teams, a full classroom. Will you miss it?

events.title: The Game ends
events.description: You lost

events.title: Breakfast
events.description: Come charge your energies for the last hours of hacking

events.title: Hack submissions
events.description: Submit your project in our Devpost!

events.title: Hacking ends
events.description: SUBMIT YOUR PROJECT BEFORE IT'S TOO LATE

events.title: Showers
events.description: Relax a bit before the demos start

events.title: Demos
events.description: It's demo time! Your vote will be taken into account too!

events.title: Lunch
events.description: Come grab some frankfurts/bratswurts made by our awesome partners Leo Boeck

events.title: Closing Ceremony
events.description: And the winners are... Come watch the finalists and winners!
